name: Universe in Cum 💦 🌎
description:
Universe in Cum 💦 🌎 is an adult Visual Novel About the priggishness of a young girl in space.
The game begins with the protagonist Natalie flying on a scientific mission to a new planet. Her ship crashes and crashes in an unknown place. She is rescued by a local resident who offers her help in finding an old human station and sending an sos signal from there. This is how their journey begins, and they will encounter various alien creatures on their way, trying to attack the heroine. The reason is that the smell of humans makes the locals have an unbearable desire for sex.
In the end, of course, the heroine and her companion find the station and rescue her, but it's not so simple, because the heroine's companion turned out to be not so kind and managed to lay her eggs in her during the farewell
All characters in the game are over the age of 18.
Features:
Plenty of lewd scenes with various sexy boys
A fascinating story
A Multitude of Sexy Situations
Real-time 3D character and animations
Ability to play with one hand. ( ͡~ ͜ʖ ͡°)
